content: Hi David, does your tool support adding in the dosageinstruction type for pharmacy resources?

Sorry melva, detailed support for complex datatypes / logical modesl is quite limited in this version. If you're doing that level of detailed analysis of a resource, the original resource builder may be the better bet for you. I will resolve this by next time, but that doesn't help you now... Sorry about that...
David, when you say "original resoure builder" what do you mean? I don't see it in the resource builder?
Oh - sorry about - there were a number of 'breaking' changes in the conformance resources with this release and I didn't keep up with them all...
I had some booleans - isgeneric for medication and active for practitioner. I could only make them true/active.
